tools.name: Socket Set
tools.description: Metric and SAE socket set for nuts and bolts. Includes ratchet, extensions, and multiple drive sizes.

tools.name: Oil Filter Wrench
tools.description: Removes and installs spin-on oil filters. Available in strap, cap, and chain styles.

tools.name: Jack Stands
tools.description: Safety stands to support a raised vehicle. Always use with a hydraulic jack.

tools.name: Hydraulic Floor Jack
tools.description: Lifts vehicles for tire changes and undercarriage work. Common capacities 2‚Äì3 tons.

tools.name: Torque Wrench
tools.description: Applies precise torque to fasteners. Click, beam, or digital types. Critical for lug nuts and head bolts.

tools.name: Breaker Bar
tools.description: Long-handled bar for loosening stuck nuts and bolts. Used with sockets.

tools.name: Oil Drain Pan
tools.description: Catches used motor oil during oil changes. Often has pour spout for recycling.

tools.name: Funnel Set
tools.description: Pour fluids into reservoirs without spillage. Various sizes for oil, coolant, transmission fluid.

tools.name: Spark Plug Socket
tools.description: Deep socket with rubber insert to grip and remove spark plugs. Often includes extension.

tools.name: OBD-II Scanner
tools.description: Reads diagnostic codes and live data from vehicle computer. Essential for check-engine diagnosis.

tools.name: Battery Charger / Maintainer
tools.description: Charges and maintains 12V batteries. Trickle and smart chargers extend battery life.

tools.name: Creeper
tools.description: Low platform on wheels to slide under vehicles while working.

tools.name: Tire Pressure Gauge
tools.description: Measures tire pressure. Digital or analog. Critical for safety and fuel economy.

tools.name: Tire Iron / Lug Wrench
tools.description: Removes and installs lug nuts when changing tires. Cross or L-shaped.

tools.name: Brake Bleeder Kit
tools.description: Bleeds air from brake lines. One-person kits use vacuum or pressure.

tools.name: Claw Hammer
tools.description: General-purpose hammer with curved claw for pulling nails. 16 oz common for framing.

tools.name: Circular Saw
tools.description: Power saw for straight cuts in lumber, plywood, and sheet goods. Adjustable depth and angle.

tools.name: Chisel Set
tools.description: Bevel-edge chisels for woodworking: paring, mortising, and general shaping.

tools.name: Tape Measure
tools.description: Retractable measuring tape. 25 ft standard; wide blade for stability when extended.

tools.name: Speed Square
tools.description: Triangular layout and marking tool. 90¬∞ and 45¬∞ angles and saw guide.

tools.name: Framing Square
tools.description: Large L-shaped square for layout, stair stringers, and checking square.

tools.name: Miter Saw
tools.description: Power saw for accurate angled and cross cuts. Compound miter for crown and trim.

tools.name: Table Saw
tools.description: Stationary saw with flat table and blade for rip and cross cuts. Fence for straight guides.

tools.name: Jigsaw
tools.description: Handheld power saw for curves and irregular cuts in wood and thin metal.

tools.name: Router
tools.description: Spins bits to cut grooves, edges, and profiles. Handheld or table-mounted.

tools.name: Hand Saw
tools.description: Crosscut or rip saw for manual cutting of lumber. Various tooth counts for different work.

tools.name: Coping Saw
tools.description: Fine blade in a U-frame for curved and intricate cuts, e.g. coping moldings.

tools.name: Block Plane
tools.description: Small plane for trimming end grain, chamfers, and smoothing.

tools.name: Wood Mallet
tools.description: Strikes chisels and joinery without marring. Wood or rubber face.

tools.name: Nail Set
tools.description: Punches nails slightly below surface for filling. Various tip sizes.

tools.name: C-Clamp
tools.description: Clamp for holding work or glue-ups. Various throat depths and openings.

tools.name: Bar Clamp
tools.description: Long clamp for edge glue-ups and assembly. Pipe clamps use threaded pipe.

tools.name: Pocket Hole Jig
tools.description: Guides drill and bit for pocket screws. Strong, hidden joints for cabinets and frames.

tools.name: Countersink Bit
tools.description: Drills pilot and recess for flat-head screws so they sit flush.

tools.name: Carpenter's Pencil
tools.description: Flat, durable pencil for marking lumber. Won‚Äôt roll away.

tools.name: Wire Strippers
tools.description: Strips insulation from electrical wire. Often includes cutting and crimping notches.

tools.name: Multimeter
tools.description: Measures voltage, current, and resistance. Essential for troubleshooting circuits.

tools.name: Lineman's Pliers
tools.description: Heavy-duty pliers for cutting wire, twisting conductors, gripping. Insulated handles.

tools.name: Voltage Tester
tools.description: Non-contact or probe tester to verify presence of voltage before working.

tools.name: Crimping Tool
tools.description: Crimps terminals and connectors onto wire. Often includes wire stripping.

tools.name: Fish Tape
tools.description: Flexible tape to pull wire through conduit and walls.

tools.name: Circuit Tester
tools.description: Outlet tester or plug-in tester to check wiring (open ground, reverse polarity, etc.).

tools.name: Staple Gun (Electric)
tools.description: Tacks cable to studs and joists. Insulated staples for NM cable.

tools.name: Hole Saw Kit
tools.description: Cuts large holes in wood and drywall for boxes, pipes, and lights.

tools.name: Wire Nuts
tools.description: Twist-on connectors for splicing solid or stranded wire. Color-coded by size.

tools.name: Pipe Wrench
tools.description: Adjustable wrench for pipes and fittings. Serrated jaws. Two used in opposition for turning.

tools.name: Plunger
tools.description: Creates pressure to clear clogs in toilets and drains. Flange type for toilets.

tools.name: Basin Wrench
tools.description: Reaches behind sinks to tighten or loosen nuts on faucets and supply lines.

tools.name: Channel-Lock Pliers
tools.description: Adjustable tongue-and-groove pliers for nuts, pipes, and fittings.

tools.name: Tubing Cutter
tools.description: Cuts copper, PEX, and plastic pipe cleanly. Rotating blade.

tools.name: Pipe Threader
tools.description: Cuts threads on pipe for fittings. Manual or electric.

tools.name: Drain Snake / Auger
tools.description: Flexible cable to clear drain clogs. Hand crank or power.

tools.name: Flux & Soldering Torch
tools.description: For soldering copper pipe. Flux and lead-free solder.

tools.name: PEX Crimping Tool
tools.description: Crimps rings onto PEX tubing for fittings. Manual or cinch style.

tools.name: Toilet Flange Ring
tools.description: Replacement flange for securing toilet to drain. Often used with wax ring.

tools.name: Trowel
tools.description: Flat or pointed blade for spreading mortar, concrete, and plaster. Pointing trowel for joints.

tools.name: Mason's Hammer
tools.description: One face for striking chisels; opposite for breaking and trimming brick and block.

tools.name: Level
tools.description: Spirit or laser level for plumb and level. 2-ft and 4-ft common.

tools.name: Masonry Chisel
tools.description: Cold chisel or brick chisel for cutting and splitting block and brick.

tools.name: Jointer / Joining Trowel
tools.description: Long flat trowel for smoothing concrete and floating.

tools.name: Concrete Float
tools.description: Wood or magnesium float for smoothing concrete before final finish.

tools.name: Edger
tools.description: Rounds and finishes concrete slab edges.

tools.name: Wheelbarrow
tools.description: Hauls concrete, mortar, and materials. Steel or plastic tray.

tools.name: Mortar Hoe
tools.description: Mixing hoe for mortar and small batches of concrete.

tools.name: Paint Brush Set
tools.description: Bristle brushes in various widths for trim, cut-in, and detail.

tools.name: Roller & Sleeves
tools.description: Roller frame and replaceable sleeves for walls and ceilings. Nap for smooth or textured.

tools.name: Paint Tray
tools.description: Holds paint for rollers. Disposable liners available.

tools.name: Paint Scraper
tools.description: Removes loose paint and filler. Sharp blade, often replaceable.

tools.name: Putty Knife
tools.description: Spreads filler and spackle. Flexible blades in several widths.

tools.name: Caulk Gun
tools.description: Dispenses caulk and adhesive in tubes. Smooth bead for seams and trim.

tools.name: Drop Cloth
tools.description: Protects floors and furniture. Plastic or canvas.

tools.name: Painter's Tape
tools.description: Masking tape for clean edges. Low-tack to avoid pulling paint.

tools.name: Paint Mixing Stick
tools.description: Stirs paint in cans. Disposable or reusable.

tools.name: Drywall T-Square
tools.description: Long T-square for scoring and cutting drywall. 4-ft common.

tools.name: Drywall Knife
tools.description: Wide blade for applying joint compound. 6", 10", 12" for different passes.

tools.name: Drywall Saw
tools.description: Pointed or keyhole saw for cutting openings in drywall.

tools.name: Drywall Screw Gun
tools.description: Drill or driver with depth stop for flush screws without breaking paper.

tools.name: Corner Trowel
tools.description: Inside and outside corner trowels for joint compound.

tools.name: Mud Pan
tools.description: Holds joint compound for loading the knife.

tools.name: Drywall Lift
tools.description: Holds ceiling panels in place for solo installation.

tools.name: Rasp
tools.description: Files and rasps for shaping drywall and filler.

tools.name: Angle Grinder
tools.description: Spins discs for cutting, grinding, and polishing metal (and masonry).

tools.name: Metal File Set
tools.description: Flat, round, and half-round files for deburring and shaping metal.

tools.name: Hacksaw
tools.description: Hand saw for metal. Replaceable blades. Frame holds blade tight.

tools.name: Center Punch
tools.description: Marks drill centers and keeps bit from walking.

tools.name: Tap and Die Set
tools.description: Cuts internal (tap) and external (die) threads in metal.

tools.name: Deburring Tool
tools.description: Removes sharp edges from cut pipe and metal.

tools.name: Welding Clamp / Magnet
tools.description: Holds metal at 90¬∞ or other angles for welding.

tools.name: Ball Peen Hammer
tools.description: Round face for metal shaping and riveting.

tools.name: Vise
tools.description: Bench-mounted vise for holding metal and other work.

tools.name: Flooring Nailer
tools.description: Staple or cleat nailer for hardwood flooring. Manual or pneumatic.

tools.name: Rubber Mallet
tools.description: Taps flooring and laminate into place without marring.

tools.name: Pull Bar
tools.description: Pries and taps laminate and engineered flooring for tight joints.

tools.name: Spacers
tools.description: Wedges for expansion gap along walls when installing flooring.

tools.name: Underlayment Knife
tools.description: Trims underlayment and vinyl. Hook or utility style.

tools.name: Tile Cutter
tools.description: Score-and-snap or wet saw for cutting tile.

tools.name: Notched Trowel
tools.description: Spreads adhesive with notches for tile and vinyl. Notch size by tile.

tools.name: Knee Pads
tools.description: Protects knees when installing flooring and tiling.

tools.name: Shovel
tools.description: Round-point or square-point for digging and moving soil.

tools.name: Rake
tools.description: Leaf rake or garden rake for leveling and clearing.

tools.name: Hoe
tools.description: Weeding and breaking soil. Draw and stirrup hoes.

tools.name: Pruning Shears
tools.description: Bypass or anvil for cutting branches and stems.

tools.name: Loppers
tools.description: Long-handled cutters for thicker branches.

tools.name: Hand Pruner
tools.description: Small pruners for twigs and light trimming.

tools.name: Hedge Trimmer
tools.description: Manual or power for shaping hedges and shrubs.

tools.name: Post Hole Digger
tools.description: Two-handled tool for digging narrow holes for posts.

tools.name: Lawn Mower
tools.description: Push or powered mower for cutting grass.

tools.name: String Trimmer
tools.description: Trims grass along edges and fences. Electric or gas.

tools.name: Safety Glasses
tools.description: Protects eyes from debris, dust, and splashes. ANSI-rated.

tools.name: Hearing Protection
tools.description: Ear muffs or plugs for noise from power tools.

tools.name: Work Gloves
tools.description: Leather or synthetic for grip and hand protection.

tools.name: Dust Mask / Respirator
tools.description: Filters dust and particles. N95 or P100 for heavier exposure.

tools.name: Hard Hat
tools.description: Protects head on job sites. Required in many construction settings.

tools.name: Steel-Toe Boots
tools.description: Protects feet from impact and punctures.

tools.name: First Aid Kit
tools.description: Basic supplies for cuts, burns, and minor injuries on site.

tools.name: Fire Extinguisher
tools.description: ABC type for workshop and garage. Mount in accessible spot.

tools.name: Screwdriver Set
tools.description: Flat and Phillips in multiple sizes. Essential for assembly and repair.

tools.name: Adjustable Wrench
tools.description: Jaw width adjusts to fit different nut and bolt sizes. 6" to 18" common.

tools.name: Utility Knife
tools.description: Retractable blade for cardboard, drywall, rope, and packages.

tools.name: Pliers Set
tools.description: Slip-joint, needle-nose, and locking pliers for gripping, bending, cutting.

tools.name: Cordless Drill / Driver
tools.description: Drills holes and drives screws. Lithium-ion, multiple speeds.

tools.name: Drill Bit Set
tools.description: Twist bits for wood and metal. Fractional and metric.

tools.name: Allen Key Set
tools.description: Hex keys for socket-head screws. Fold-up sets or L-keys.

tools.name: Rubber Mallet
tools.description: Soft face for tapping without marring. Assembly and flooring.

tools.name: Staple Gun (Manual)
tools.description: Heavy-duty manual stapler for upholstery, screening, insulation.

tools.name: Flashlight / Work Light
tools.description: Handheld or corded work light for dim areas.

tools.name: Extension Cord
tools.description: Powers tools at distance. Outdoor-rated for job sites.

tools.name: Ladder
tools.description: Step or extension ladder for height. Fiberglass preferred around electricity.

tools.name: Toolbox / Bag
tools.description: Carries hand tools. Soft bag or hard case.

tools.name: Stud Finder
tools.description: Locates studs and sometimes wiring behind drywall.

tools.name: Square
tools.description: Combination or try square for 90¬∞ layout and checking.

tools.name: Clamps (Quick/Spring)
tools.description: One-handed clamps for temporary hold. Spring or trigger style.
